## Utils.remove() method

Removes the `module` whose id is `mn` from [Meta.modules](./packer.meta.modules.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(mn: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mn | string | The id of the <code>module</code> to be removed |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
